messages.subject: Comment on school debate
messages.msgSnippet: Hello again, I get grief from practically everyone about unschooling . I call it child-led-learning because unschooling seems to set everyone in a panic.
messages.messageBody:
Hello again,
I get grief from practically everyone about "unschooling". I call it "child-led-learning" because "unschooling" seems to set everyone in a panic. My mother says,"They're so smart- please don't ruin them." - in front of the girls! argh-
My best and dearest friend- who is a hs'er but a curriculumaholic- bless her anal heart- is very concerned that they will not learn what they need to- even though my "kindergartener" (hate that)- is keeping up with her 1st grader. I know they all mean well- but a little confidence in me would be nice. I also know that with time they will see that this is the best choice for my girls- and if not-- TOO BAD! (giggle). Everyone else keeps quiet- I guess they think I'll send them to school before long-
Reenie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
